title: Somebody pls help
body: Ok so i recently purchased an account transfer on my other account from turkey  server to EUW server, and after i tried logging in they said wait for a few mins. Now its been almost 2 hours and they still display the message saying that the account is in the process of transferring. Ive invested so much in that account and it'd be really disappointing to lose it. Someone pls help...thx

replies.body: Sometimes an account can get stuck during those transfers, but they're easily fixed! Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to push that transfer through!
